trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a composite format string, along with the arguments to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of arguments to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of arguments to be formatted.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the argument at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns an object array that contains one or more objects to format.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object array that contains one or more objects to format.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a result string in which arguments are formatted by using the conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object to convert to a result string.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string that results from formatting the current instance by using the conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the string that results from formatting the format string along with its arguments by using the formatting conventions of a specified culture.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that provides culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string formatted using the conventions of the formatProvider parameter.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the string that results from formatting the composite format string along with its arguments by using the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A result string formatted by using the conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the string that results from formatting the composite format string along with its arguments by using the formatting conventions of a specified culture.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that provides culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A result string formatted by using the conventions of formatProvider.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxxx$$xx$.
